title: COP30 final agreement omits fossil fuels

title: Ancient Folklore Upends Dangerous Savanna Myths
description: Literature from western India describe diverse savanna landscapes, defying the dogma that these ecosystems resulted from relatively recent deforestationThe post Ancient Folklore Upends Dangerous Savanna Myths appeared first on Nautilus.

title: Advanced Security Isn't Stopping Ancient Phishing Tactics

title: A miracle and a warning: Ancient tower collapse reveals a crisis facing modern Rome | CNN
description: The partial collapse of the Torre di Conti has sparked a negligence probe and renewed fears about how the Eternal City protects — and fails — its ancient heritage.
